message.content:
1. Sixty-two patients suffered from halitosis.
2. The same sixty-two patients also suffered from foreign body sensation due to CCT.
3. These patients were enrolled in a randomized clinical trial.
4. The patients were randomly assigned into two groups.

messages.content:
Statement: Sixty-two patients who suffered from halitosis and/or foreign body sensation due to CCT were enrolled in the present randomized clinical trial, and were randomly assigned into two groups.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
